query.statement: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DATE FROM TEST_BOARD #if ($SEARCH_CONDITION == "BOARD_NO") WHERE BOARD_NO = :SEARCH_KEYWORD #elseif($SEARCH_CONDITION == "BOARD_TITLE") WHERE BOARD_TITLE like '%' || :SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%' #end
INSERT INTO TEST_BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DATE) VALUES (:BOARD_NO, :BOARD_TITLE, :CONTENTS, :REG_ID, :REG_DATE)
UPDATE TEST_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = :BOARD_TITLE, CONTENTS = :CONTENTS, REG_ID =:REG_ID, REG_DATE = :REG_DATE WHERE BOARD_NO = :BOARD_NO
SELECT TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DATE, COMMUNITY_ID, POST_ID FROM MIP_BOARD WHERE POST_ID = :POST_ID
